title: [Sponsor] How I Accidentally Built a Podcast API Business
content:
Hey, I’m Wenbin, the founder of Listen Notes (the best podcast search engine). Wanted to share with you my journey of building an API business and the technology behind it. Hopefully this article could inspire a few new API businesses :)

If you want to jumpstart your podcast project, try out our podcast API at listennotes.com/api.

Or if you want to find all podcast interviews of a person, just search his/her name on listennotes.com (no need to download a new app).

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
